title: Bug 6304 - Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the Team entry is missing from the context menu.
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the Team entry is not available in the context menu.
EB: When I select a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, the Team entry should appear in the context menu.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
